name: The Ascension
description:
The Ascension is a Roguelike First Person Shooter where you take on the role of a “soldier” and fight your way through waves of monsters to reach the surface of the planet. You will face a variety of monsters, and bosses, with each having unique stats and random spawns. The higher you climb, the more difficult it will get. And death is permanent. But fret not! For you are blessed with an arsenal of Weapons, Utility Items, and Perks to use against your enemies.

FEATURES
· Weapon Upgrade System: There are 24 guns and 4 knives that are separated into 4 tiers. You can collect Weapon Parts, and use them to upgrade your weapons. The higher you upgrade, the better weapons you will get.



· Utility Items: Utility Items are active items. You can have 2 different ones at the same time, and each one has their own unique powers when used.
· Perks: Perks are passive items. You can have unlimited amount of Perks and their powers will stack-up.



· Character Classes: Pick from a variety of characters, each having their own starting gear, passive abilities, and one active ability, unique to every class.
· Randomly Generated Levels: There are many different themes for levels. Each time you start a level, a theme will be picked randomly, and with that theme, a level will be generated… randomly. You can also find unique levels throughout your runs.
· Unlocks: Not everything will be available in the beginning. By playing the game, you can unlock new Utility Items, Perks, and Characters Classes.
· Perma Death: It’s a Roguelike, what do you expect?
